channel.title: Comments on: A weekend in Brighton

item.title: By: Phillip Deftereos
item.dc:creator: Phillip Deftereos
item.description: <p>The credible caption would be "What the &^!! does this button do !"</p><p>Great to catch up on Sat night ! Thank God for Nurofen and a cooked breakfast the next morning !</p>
item.content:encoded:
The credible caption would be “What the &^!! does this button do !”

Great to catch up on Sat night ! Thank God for Nurofen and a cooked breakfast the next morning !
